original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū asannihitaparikkhārā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena satta rasavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū a sannihita parikkhārāḥ honti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhenti.
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhenti
sattarasavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū etat avocuḥ
detha āvuso amhākam pattam pi cīvaram pi iti

original: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū amhākaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhentī”ti.
analyzed: ime āvuso chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū amhākam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhenti iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhūnam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhūnam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe moghapurisāḥ bhikkhūnam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā nisīdanaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ vā kāyabandhanaṁ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā, antamaso hasāpekkhopi, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattam vā cīvaram vā nisīdanam vā sūci gharam vā kāya bandhanam vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: channaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ, vikappanupagaṁ pacchimaṁ.
analyzed: channam cīvarānam aññataram cīvara vikappana upagam
sa sūcikam vai a sūcikam vā

original: Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi apanidheti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sakim āṇattaḥ bahukam pi apanidheti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā nisīdanaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ vā kāyabandhanaṁ vā apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā, antamaso hasāpekkhopi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī pattam vā cīvaram vā nisīdanam vā sūci gharam vā kāya bandhanam vā apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api āpatti pācittiyassa

original: upasampanne anupasampannasaññī pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā nisīdanaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ vā kāyabandhanaṁ vā apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā, antamaso hasāpekkhopi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī pattam vā cīvaram vā nisīdanam vā sūci gharam vā kāya bandhanam vā apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aññaṁ parikkhāraṁ apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā, antamaso hasāpekkhopi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññam parikkhāram apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anupasampannassa pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā aññaṁ vā parikkhāraṁ apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā, antamaso hasāpekkhopi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa pattam vā cīvaram vā aññam vā parikkhāram apanidheti vā apanidhāpeti vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
dhammim katham katvā dassāmi iti paṭisāmeti
